name: Hill runner brothers
description:
Alfred and Freddy are two nearly brain dead teenagers with a cherished dream of becoming the next big hit on the internet,

They spend day and night practicing on the biggest hills they can find,
with self-injuring stunts they are recording them on camera in hopes to take a perfect shot.

Help the guys to safely ride down the hill, collect coins, unlock new equipment and catch your moment of glory!

Enjoy the game!
